articles.title: BTS, TWICE, And Epik High Make Rolling Stone's “The 50 Best Songs Of 2021” List - soompi

articles.title: Chile same-sex marriage: Law overwhelmingly approved by parliament - BBC News
articles.description: A law allowing same-sex marriage is approved in the historically Catholic Latin American country.
articles.content:

Image caption, Supporters of LGBT rights celebrate the passing of a same-sex marriage law by Chile's parliament

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Doug Parker, architect of merger trend that resulted in four major US airlines, is retiring - CNN
articles.description: Doug Parker will retire in March as CEO of American Airlines, the airline that he made the world's largest through a series of mergers that led to a massive consolidation of the US airline industry.
